channel.title: Research on Trang Bui
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Trang Bui

item.title: Papers
item.description: Methodology Papers General additive network effects model - with Stefan H. Steiner and Nathaniel T. Stevens. New England Journal of Statistics and Data Science (2023), 1-19, doi 10.51387/23-NEJSDS29. Featured in the “Design and Analysis of Experiments for Data Science” webinar by the New England Journal of Statistics in Data Science. Applied Papers Understanding the Impact of Seasonal Climate Change on Canada’s Economy by Region and Sector - with Shiyu He, Yuying Huang, Wenling Zhang, Jie Jian, Samuel W.

item.title: Talks
item.description: Statistical Society of Canada Annual Meeting 2023, Analytic Approaches for Novel Data Sources. General Linear Network Effects Model. Won the Business and Industrial Statistics Section Student Research Oral Presentation Award. Virtual ISI World Statistics Congress 2021, IPS69, General Linear Network Effects Model for Network Experimentation. Student Seminar Series UWaterloo 2020, Introduction to Experimental Design on Networks.
